name: odsbox-jaquel-mcp
description: ASAM ODS Jaquel MCP Server - Query builder and validator for ASAM ODS Jaquel database queries
author: totonga

tools.name: validate_jaquel_query
tools.description: Validate a Jaquel query structure for syntax errors and best practices

tools.name: validate_filter_condition
tools.description: Validate a WHERE clause filter condition in a Jaquel query

tools.name: get_operator_documentation
tools.description: Get documentation and examples for Jaquel operators like $like, $in, $gt, $lt, etc.

tools.name: suggest_optimizations
tools.description: Suggest optimizations and simplifications for a Jaquel query to improve performance

tools.name: get_query_pattern
tools.description: Get a template for common Jaquel query patterns (get_all, get_by_id, search, joins, aggregates)

tools.name: list_query_patterns
tools.description: List all available Jaquel query patterns and templates

tools.name: generate_query_skeleton
tools.description: Generate a query skeleton for a specific entity and operation type

tools.name: build_filter_condition
tools.description: Build a filter condition for WHERE clause with proper syntax

tools.name: explain_jaquel_query
tools.description: Explain what a Jaquel query does in plain English

tools.name: merge_filter_conditions
tools.description: Merge multiple filter conditions with AND/OR logic

tools.name: check_entity_schema
tools.description: Get available fields for an entity from ODS model schema

tools.name: validate_field_exists
tools.description: Check if a field exists in entity schema

tools.name: validate_filter_against_schema
tools.description: Validate filter against actual entity schema to ensure field compatibility

tools.name: debug_query_steps
tools.description: Break down a query into steps for debugging and understanding

tools.name: suggest_error_fixes
tools.description: Get suggestions to fix query syntax errors or validation issues

tools.name: connect_ods_server
tools.description: Establish connection to ASAM ODS server for live model inspection and query execution

tools.name: disconnect_ods_server
tools.description: Close connection to ODS server

tools.name: get_ods_connection_info
tools.description: Get current ODS server connection information and available entities

tools.name: list_ods_entities
tools.description: Return list of all available entities from ODS server ModelCache with their descriptions

tools.name: execute_ods_query
tools.description: Execute a Jaquel query directly on connected ODS server and get results

tools.name: get_submatrix_measurement_quantities
tools.description: Get measurement quantities and submatrices for a measurement

tools.name: read_submatrix_data
tools.description: Read timeseries data from a submatrix using bulk data access API

tools.name: get_test_to_measurement_hierarchy
tools.description: Get hierarchical entity chain from AoTest to AoMeasurement with relations

tools.name: generate_submatrix_fetcher_script
tools.description: Generate Python scripts for fetching submatrix data with error handling and data processing

tools.name: generate_plotting_code
tools.description: Generate Python plotting code for measurement comparison visualizations

tools.name: generate_measurement_comparison_notebook
tools.description: Generate a Jupyter notebook for comparing measurements with analysis and plots

tools.name: get_bulk_api_help
tools.description: Get help and guidance on using the Bulk API for loading timeseries data

features: Timeseries data access via Bulk API
